rank: SELECT devrant_id, {type} FROM drs_users ORDER BY rants DESC
add: INSERT INTO drs_users (devrant_id, username, start_time, created_time, avatar_url, avatar_bg, score, rants, dpp) VALUES ({devrant_id}, '{username}', 0, {created_time}, '{avatar_url}', '{avatar_bg}', {score}, {rants}, 0)
exists: SELECT username FROM drs_users WHERE devrant_id='{id}'
